lead_paragraph: New Zealand all-rounder Jimmy Neesham will miss the second test against India in Kolkata due to the rib injury that kept him out of the first match in Kanpur, coach Mike Hesson said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Neesham to Miss Kolkata Test, Patel's Arrival Delayed
headline.main: Neesham to Miss Kolkata Test, Patel's Arrival Delayed

snippet: New Zealand all-rounder Jimmy Neesham will miss the second test against India in Kolkata due to the rib injury that kept him out of the first match in Kanpur, coach Mike Hesson said on Wednesday....
